name: tiktok_celeb_morph
description: Classic TikTok morph trend - transform into different celebrities with trendy locations
author: StarStitch

global_scene.location_prompt: taking a selfie, trendy cafe background, aesthetic lighting, instagram style, 4k photorealistic
global_scene.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, cartoon, low quality, watermark, text

sequence.name: You
sequence.visual_prompt: A person with natural smile, casual modern outfit

sequence.name: Celebrity 1
sequence.visual_prompt: A famous person with confident expression

sequence.name: Celebrity 2
sequence.visual_prompt: A famous person with warm smile
